info.brief_description: Somehow, you have been shrunk, and you must survive, or you'll meet a foul-smelling doom.
info.description:
You loved fat women. You always thought that "bigger is better". Unfortunately for you, that wouldn't be the case, since you shrink! Now you must survive from this nightmare, or end up a small, stinky corpse from a huge woman's ass.

All right, guys. Here are the rules:
1. Deaths are allowed, but no early deaths. Let the chapters go long, then there can be death
2. The deaths have to be Ass-related(farting, toilet, butt crushing, etc.)
3. No male characters, other than the main character.
4. No Gay/Lesbian content. Sorry, but it's not my forte.
5. No bad grammar or misspelling.
6. No one sentence chapters. Let it at least be 1 paragraph or more.

Other that that, anything goes. Have fun!

EDIT: I forgot to put this. Sorry. I'll keep the chapters that are done up. But I prefer the BBW's to be unaware of you most of the time. Thanks for adding on!
